item.source: Japan scientist synthesizes meat from human feces

item.title: Japan scientist synthesizes meat from human feces
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

I really don’t think people could get past the fact that its made from shit.

I doubt this will become something you’ll see in many supermarkets. Maybe in the distant future. But just like Yakman said, this is something that would be perfect for a space colony. Urine and sweat is already recycled in the ISS, so recycling shit means that pretty much every human waste product is recycled. All that’s left is CO2, which is something Mars could use.

Read full topic

if it was in your body to begin with it cant be bad for you though -.-
[/quote]
It was in a part of your body that was designed to keep the bacteria controlled though[/quote]what if you ate it backwards then

item.title: Japan scientist synthesizes meat from human feces
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:15, topic:399692”][quote author=yakman link=topic=496817.msg3632680#msg3632680 date=1308354998]
Will be useful for space colonies.
[/quote]

Exactly. Step by step we’re getting there, although I wonder if a diet consisting solely of shit burgers would be healthy, and could sustain itself in the long run.[/quote]

Well obviously by conservation of energy you cant live solely off your own shit.
And of course other nutrients get used up too.
